text: Nayib Armando Bukele Ortez (born 24 July 1981) is a Salvadoran politician and businessman. He is the 46th and current President of El Salvador from 1 June 2019. He won the 2019 election. Bukele ran as the candidate of the centre- right GANA party. He was reelected for a second 5 year term on 4 February 2024 He was elected Mayor of Nuevo Cuscatl√°n on 11 March 2012. He was also elected mayor of San Salvador on 1 March 2015, and took office on 1 May 2015. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of El Salvador Category:Current national leaders Category:Salvadoran mayors Category:21st-century presidents in North America
title: Nayib Bukele
